question: What Happens If Max Disturbs The Bird's Nest And Sides With Chloe?

choices.A: Joyce Will Text Max A Picture Of The Destroyed Nest
choices.C: Max Will Lament Trapping The Bird In The House
choices.D: Nathan Will Message Max, Threatening To Take Away Her Scholarship

question: What Happens If Max Breaks Open Nathan's Room And Leaves?

choices.A: Nathan Will Message Max, Threatening To Take Away Her Scholarship
choices.C: Warren Will Text Max, Thanking Her And Saying He'll Never Erase The Message

question: What Happens If Max Steps In During The Fight Between Warren And Nathan?

choices.B: Chloe Will Take Nathan's Gun, Allowing Her To Kill Or Hurt Frank If She Didn't Have David's Gun
choices.C: Daniel Will Be Standing Next To Brooke At The Vortex Club Party
choices.D: Frank Will Be Depressed Because She Was The One Who Killed Frank
